main event: A silver object was visually observed flying in a straight line at a 15-degree elevation above the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The object was reported to be flying at a course of 315 degrees., Witnesses noted that the object had a silver appearance., The object was seen at a distance of approximately 45 to 60 degrees above the horizon., There was speculation about the possibility of it being an Earth satellite.
witness description: visual observation with noting specific angles and details of the object
